rounds.category: WHAT SORT OF ESTABLISHMENT IS THIS?

clues.text: The type of roadhouse called a this joint lent its name to a coin-operated music machine

rounds.comments: (Alex: In every response there is the name of someone that is also the name of a popular toy.)
